mapper.insert: insert zyyj_course_programme values((select course_id from zyyj_course where name=#{course}), #{programme_id});
insert zyyj_practice_record values((select user_id from zyyj_user where realname=#{creator}), #{programme_id});
mapper.update: update zyyj_programme set name=#{name}, score=#{score}, comment=#{note} where programme_id=#{programme_id};
update zyyj_course_programme set course_id = (select course_id from zyyj_course where name=#{course}) where programme_id=#{programme_id};
mapper.select: select prog.programme_id, prog.name, u.realname as creator, prog.createdate, prog.score, c.name as course, prog.comment as note from zyyj_programme as prog, zyyj_course as c, zyyj_course_programme as cp, zyyj_user as u, zyyj_practice_record as r where c.course_id=cp.course_id and prog.programme_id=cp.programme_id and u.user_id=r.user_id and r.programme_id=prog.programme_id and prog.name like #{name};

select prog.programme_id, prog.name, u.realname as creator, prog.createdate, prog.score, c.name as course, prog.comment as note from zyyj_programme as prog, zyyj_course as c, zyyj_course_programme as cp, zyyj_user as u, zyyj_practice_record as r where c.course_id=cp.course_id and prog.programme_id=cp.programme_id and u.user_id=r.user_id and r.programme_id=prog.programme_id and c.name like #{course};
